#################################################

Release Name:
FATE.The.Traitor.Soul.(WildTangent.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: FATE The Traitor Soul
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
	Processor: Pentium 3 - 800MHz or better
	Video Card RAM: 32MB, 3D hardware acceleration required
	Internet Browsers: IE 5.5 or above
	DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
	RAM: 256 MB for XP, 512 MB for Vista
	Operating System: Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista and XP
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Mount FATE_TS.iso
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

When the Traveler speaks of a test within the Temple of Fate, presented to only the most dedicated of champions, you stand confident that the spoils beyond the portal will be yours. The challenge of FATE - The Traitor Soul is your destiny...will you accept it? Seek fortune and glory within the Chamber of Trials by battling the evil that lurks within. Fight your way through innumerable dungeons, caverns, and tunnels, with one of five loyal pets by your side. Play as yourself, or in the guise of a new hero: an Orc, Cogger, or Elven warrior. Choose from 50 new pieces of armor and 13 new spells. Evil trembles before you, and the ultimate challenge awaits you in FATE - The Traitor Soul!

Release Notes:

To customize your resolution, open config.dat (located in %ProgramData%WildTangentfatethetraitorsoulPersistent ) in a text editor and edit SCREENWIDTH:800 SCREENHEIGHT:600 to equal your monitor's supported resolution. Don't worry, as Fate can run on almost any custom resolution. (Got a 1920x1080 screen? Use it!)

A: Yes.
